mapper.insert: insert into racetype_info (racetype) select '${racetype}' from dual where not exists (select * from racetype_info where racetype='${racetype}')
insert into roundtype_info (roundtype) select '${roundtype}' from dual where not exists (select * from roundtype_info where roundtype='${roundtype}')
insert into progression_info (progression) select '${progression}' from dual where not exists (select * from progression_info where progression='${progression}')
insert into team_info (team_name) select '${value}' from dual where not exists (select * from team_info where team_name='${value}')
mapper.select: select racetype_info.racetype_key from racetype_info where racetype='${racetype}'
select roundtype_info.roundtype_key from roundtype_info where roundtype='${roundtype}'
select progression_info.progression_key from progression_info where progression='${progression}'
select race_num from race_info where race_num=(select max(race_num) from race_info)
mapper.insert: insert into record_info values (null,'${race_num}', (select team_info.team_num from team_info where team_name='${RankOneTeam}'),1,'${RankOneRacetime}')
insert into record_info values (null,'${race_num}', (select team_info.team_num from team_info where team_name='${RankTwoTeam}'),2,'${RankTwoRacetime}')
insert into record_info values (null,'${race_num}', (select team_info.team_num from team_info where team_name='${RankThreeTeam}'),3,'${RankThreeRacetime}')
insert into record_info values (null,'${race_num}', (select team_info.team_num from team_info where team_name='${RankFourTeam}'),4,'${RankFourRacetime}')
insert into record_info values (null,'${race_num}', (select team_info.team_num from team_info where team_name='${RankFiveTeam}'),5,'${RankFiveRacetime}')
insert into record_info values (null,'${race_num}', (select team_info.team_num from team_info where team_name='${RankSixTeam}'),6,'${RankSixRacetime}')
mapper.select: select team_name,team_num from team_info where team_num in ( select team_num from record_info group by team_num )
select roundtype_key,roundtype from roundtype_info where roundtype_key in ( select roundtype_key from race_info group by roundtype_key )
select race_info.race_num from race_info where race_info.race_date between '${start_date}' and '${end_date}'

select event_name,race_date, (select roundtype from roundtype_info where roundtype_key= (select roundtype_key from race_info where race_num='${value}')) as roundtype,
(select progression from progression_info where progression_key= (select progression_key from race_info where race_num='${value}')) as progression,
(select racetype from racetype_info where racetype_key= (select racetype_key from race_info where race_num='${value}')) as racetype,
(select team_name from team_info where team_num= (select team_num from record_info where race_num='${value}')) as team_name,
(select rank from record_info where race_num='${value}')as rank,
(select race_time from record_info where race_num='${value}')as race_time
from race_info where race_num='${value}'
